channel.title: Help
channel.description: Im really new to this scar stuff, and I don't know the first thing about it. Can somebody please post a simple autofighter maybe autoheals but trains on rats in varroc sewers and ive looked at some of the other autotrainer scripts but it says select colour and has numbers. How do you know what number a colour is?

item.title: Help
item.dc:creator: @exe626 exe626
item.description:
@exe626 wrote:

uh, k. try clickin the little color selector, and click a common color on the rat, id suggest its back, because its unique from other things in the area, and put it in the monster i.d. area, it wouldn’t be hard.

Read full topic
